mapper.select: SELECT wfor.`id` recordId, wfor.`external_user_id` externalUserId, wc.`name` externalUserName, wc.`avatar` externalUserHeadImage, wfor.`form_result`, wfor.`channel_type`, wfor.`commit_time` FROM we_form_oper_record wfor LEFT JOIN we_customer wc ON wfor.external_user_id = wc.external_userid WHERE wfor.form_id = #{formId} AND wc.corp_id = #{corpId} AND wfor.commit_flag = TRUE AND wfor.`external_user_id` IS NOT NULL ORDER BY wfor.`commit_time` DESC
